snippet: Harald Joachim von der Goltz has been been a longtime client of Mossack Fonseca. The following documents illustrate how Mossack Fonseca established accounts using Mr. von der Goltz's Guatemalan nationality and passport.
lead_paragraph: Harald Joachim von der Goltz has been been a longtime client of Mossack Fonseca. The following documents illustrate how Mossack Fonseca established accounts using Mr. von der Goltz's Guatemalan nationality and passport.

headline.main: Harald Joachim von Der Goltz and Mossack Fonseca
